Contact a Staff Member
----------------------

[Sign in to Save Progress](https://www.balchspringstx.gov/FormCenter/Contact-Forms-4/Contact-a-Staff-Member-45)



This form has been modified since it was saved. Please review all fields before submitting.

2. ![Balch Springs_Positive Color_Logo-City](https://www.balchspringstx.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=811)
4. After submission, a staff member will respond soon.

   Do not use this form for Public Information Request, or for Fire or Police emergencies, call 911.
6. First Name\*
7. Last Name\*
9. Email Address\*
10. Phone Number
12. Department\*

14. Question / Comment\*

    This field is not part of the form submission.
